Container.Name: AskaDedicatedServer
Container.Overview:
ASKA is a multiplayer survival game set in a mythical Viking Age world. This container runs a dedicated server for ASKA using Proton-GE for compatibility.
REQUIREMENTS: - Authentication token from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers for App ID: 1898300 - UDP ports 27015 and 27016 must be forwarded in your router
SAVE MANAGEMENT: - Leave ASKA_SAVE_ID empty for new servers (auto-generated after first save) - For existing saves: place savegame_* folder in /aska-saves volume and delete server.properties.docker.txt - Save ID format: characters after 'savegame_' (e.g., bbdb7_1801262114211)
CUSTOM MODE: - Set ASKA_MODE to 'custom' to enable advanced settings (terrain, seasons, difficulty, etc.) - Advanced settings must be configured in server.properties.docker.txt file
For more information, visit the Docker Hub page.

Config.Name: Server Display Name
Config.Description: Name displayed in the session/server browser

Config.Name: Server Internal Name
Config.Description: Internal server identifier/hostname (use lowercase, hyphens allowed, no spaces)

Config.Name: Authentication Token
Config.Description: Steam GSL authentication token from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers (App ID: 1898300). REQUIRED.

Config.Name: Save ID
Config.Description: Save ID from savegame folder name (e.g., bbdb7_1801262114211). Leave empty for new world or auto-detection. Auto-populated after first save.

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Password required to join the server (leave empty for no password)

Config.Name: Region
Config.Description: Server region: default (auto-ping best), asia, japan, europe, south america, south korea, usa east, usa west, australia, canada east, hong kong, india, turkey, united arab emirates, usa south central

Config.Name: Game Mode
Config.Description: normal = standard gameplay | custom = enables terrain, season, difficulty customization (edit server.properties.docker.txt for custom settings)

Config.Name: Max Players
Config.Description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server (1-4)

Config.Name: World Seed
Config.Description: World generation seed (leave empty for random)

Config.Name: Keep World Alive
Config.Description: true = world updates even with no players | false = world loads/unloads with players

Config.Name: Autosave Style
Config.Description: Options: every morning, disabled, every 5 minutes, every 10 minutes, every 15 minutes, every 20 minutes

Config.Name: Worker Threads
Config.Description: Unity worker threads - leave empty for auto (CPU cores - 1)

Config.Name: Skip Steam Update
Config.Description: Skip Steam updates on container start: 0 = update (recommended), 1 = skip updates

Config.Name: Steam Validate
Config.Description: Validate game files on start: 0 = no validation (faster), 1 = validate files (slower, fixes corruption)

Config.Name: Time Zone
Config.Description: Container timezone (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Kuala_Lumpur)

Config.Name: Enable Save Backup
Config.Description: Enable automatic backup on container start: 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled

Config.Name: Keep Backups
Config.Description: Number of backup saves to retain (only applies when ASKA_SAVE_BACKUP=1)

Config.Name: Crash Pattern
Config.Description: Custom log pattern for crash detection (advanced users only - leave empty for default)

Config.Name: Server Data
Config.Description: Server installation and data directory (contains server.properties.docker.txt for advanced customization)

Config.Name: Save Files
Config.Description: Directory for world saves and backups (savegame_* folders go here)

Config.Name: Game Port (UDP)
Config.Description: Steam game port - clients connect here for gameplay (must be forwarded in router)

Config.Name: Query Port (UDP)
Config.Description: Steam query port - manages server browser and client pings (must be forwarded in router)
